summary: A man has 2 wives and one does not know about the other. The film shows the funny situations that arise with the man as a result of this.
cast: Vandana Gupte|Mohan Joshi|Sanjay Narvekar|Atul Parchure|Satish Phulekar|Uday Sabnis|Mugdha Shah|Sushant Shelar|Sai Tamhankar|Resham Tipnis
title: Be dune saade chaar
